author: rdelliga
body:
#### PR description:
Added to MTD Tracks Validation some plots to monitor the impact of MTD hits on the tracks Pt resolution. For details see the presentation at https://indico.cern.ch/event/1368740/contributions/5756499/attachments/2782834/4850767/MTD_January_DelliGatti.pdf
A macro to provide plots was also added.

#### PR validation:
Code compilation and production of plots.
title: MTD Validation: addition of plots for the impact of MTD on Pt resolution
